name: Disk Jumper
description:
Make your way up the platforms in this endless arcade jumper! Be careful though, once you miss one and all off, you'll have to start over.

Either download the game for Windows or OS X, or play Disk Jumper directly in browser!

Note: Xbox 360 controllers are only supported on OS X, mapped with the Tattieboogle driver.

For more, visit our website.
